title: COVID-19 Vaccine Trainings for Health Professionals
cleaned_text: Questions](/diseases/coronavirus/contact.html) Information for [Contact Info](#) Contact Info COVID-19 Vaccine Trainings for Health Professionals Training opportunities and presentations on COVID-19 vaccine. On this page: [Required training for registered COVID-19 vaccine providers](#req) [Supplemental on-demand training for vaccine providers](#supp) Required training for registered COVID-19 vaccine providers For registered COVID-19 vaccine providers, the vaccine coordinator and back-up coordinator at each site are required to watch this training and read MDH's [Interim COVID-19 Vaccine Provider Guide (PDF)](/diseases/coronavirus/vaccine/guide.pdf). Please have the guide available as you view the training. Even if you completed previous COVID-19 vaccination provider trainings, you will need to complete this training. The training is recommended for all staff handling and administering vaccine. It will take you approximately 30 minutes to complete the course. You have the option to claim a 0.5 CEU. After completing the training, keep the certificate for your records. Reminder, this online training and comprehensive review of the provider guide are mandatory for vaccine coordinators and back-up coordinators. To complete the training, go to the [MDH Learning Center](/about/tools/learningcenter.html) to create an account and enroll in the COVID-19 Vaccination Providers Training 2021. You can find the course in the catalog under Infectious Disease. If you have questions about the training, email [health.vaccineSME@state.mn.us](mailto:health.vaccineSME@state.mn.us). Supplemental on-demand training for vaccine providers This supplemental training is intended as an introduction for new vaccine providers OR as a review for vaccine providers who have not recently provided immunizations. This training is NOT a substitute for competency-based hands-on training. It will take you approximately 35 minutes to complete the course. You have the option to claim a 0.5 hour CEU.
